price: 40 Mais s’ils persistent, alors sachez qu’Allah est votre Maître. Quel bon Maître et quel excellent Protecteur !
arabic: وَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۚ نِعۡمَ ٱلۡمَوۡلَىٰ وَنِعۡمَ ٱلنَّصِيرُ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-in tawallaw fa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha mawlākum niʿ'ma al-mawlā waniʿ'ma al-naṣīru
